Title: Insomnia
Overview: Two Los Angeles homicide detectives are dispatched to a northern town where the sun doesn't set to investigate the methodical murder of a local teen.
Tagline: A tough cop. A brilliant killer. An unspeakable crime.
Keywords: detective, confession, fbi, homicide, blackmail, suspect, love, murder, los angeles, teenager, neo-noir
production_companies: Section Eight, Alcon Entertainment, Witt/Thomas Productions
Cast: Al Pacino, Robin Williams, Hilary Swank
